text: "You Are" is a 1983 song by Lionel Richie and taken from his debut studio album Lionel Richie. It went to number 4 in the United States, number 5 in Canada, number 17 in Australia and number 43 in the United Kingdom. It is the follow-up to his number one single Truly. Category:1983 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Lionel Richie songs Category:Blake Shelton songs
title: You Are (Lionel Richie song)
